name: TalkLikeSnoop
0:
”Alexa, open talk like snoop”
”Alexa, ask talk like snoop to say on the contrary this chicken is fire”
”Alexa, start talk like snoop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talk like snoop
des: Is your life lacking some..."izzle"? Do you find yourself lying awake at night struggling to incorporate Bay Area slang into your vocabulary? Then the TalkLikeSnoop skill is the skill for you! Lead your response to snoop with the word "Say" or "Translate" followed by a phrase of your choosing and listen in awe as more izzles get dropped than you can hizzle.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
